question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.In your letter:give contact details for when you are awaygive instructions on how to care for your petdescribe other household dutiesYou should write at least 150 words
text: Hope you are doing good.I am excited about the upcoming holiday trip to the Maldives and as you know it is my dream since childhood. I am planning to leave on Monday morning before that I would like to give you some instructions which will help when you are here.

The most important thing is about my fish,Fighty.The pot is placed on the dining table and you have to feed her twice a day,the food is placed beside her tank. I would be grateful if you could change the water by the middle of the week. Moreover,the essential groceries and food items are placed in the refrigerator and you can use them accordingly.If possible please keep my indoor plants outside for a few hours in the morning for sunrays.
I will keep the keys under the red carpet in the front corridor and will get in touch with you once I reach  the hotel.Hope to see you with your favourite chocolates by next Sunday.Take Care!!
